answers.author: Mark Abeles-Allison
answers.text:
I would look to your state criminal justice council for guidance.  Local Criminal Justice Coordinators are another source of great information.  Our county provides a variety of re-entry services, we do this through our criminal justice coordinator office, University Extension and contracts with local tech colleges.  Call if you would like more info.

author: Evan Raleigh
text: Our City Council has allocated funding in the upcoming fiscal year to support agencies that provide re-entry services to the local former offender community.  We are in the process of developing a request for proposals for these services and I'm in search of communities that are making grants to these types of organizations and have developed a strong RFP that we can model.  Any assistance you can offer is greatly appreciated.
title: Offender Re-Entry Services RFP
